trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Watertown
There were no other sightings in Watertown on or around November 30th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving out of the city when I noticed a string of multi-colored lights, which were not flashing, low in the night sky. It appeared to be traveling slowly, quickly changed position in the sky and was difficult to follow. At first I thought it might be a radio tower although this is a road I have traveled thousands of times and knew there wasn't anything like that in that area. Also the string of colored lights were at a 20-30 degree angle. When I was able to get to an area not as well lit with lights, I noted a faint outline of what appeared to be a triangular shape. I did see a single white light that was flashing like you would see with an airplane. I live near an army instillation and am used to seeing flying planes at night. I have never seen this type of light configuration and the shape. Does anyone have any idea if this is a ufo or just a plane?
Summary: straight row of lights, faint triangular shape in dark star-lit night
